Glazing is more than just adding sweetness‚Äîit's a culinary technique that uses gentle heat and sugar to enhance the natural flavors of vegetables. The combination of tropical flavors and French-inspired culinary finesse reflects the restaurant's signature approach to dining. Frequently Asked Questions About Glazed Carrots

Are glazed carrots a healthy side dish option?
Yes. When prepared with moderate honey and local spices, glazed carrots retain nutrients and offer a naturally sweet, wholesome accompaniment.
What sweeteners and seasonings work best for glazed carrots?
Premium honey, a touch of Balinese spices, and sea salt enhance natural sweetness while adding depth of flavor.
Can glazed carrots be prepared ahead of time or stored?
Yes. They can be gently reheated while maintaining their texture and taste, making them convenient without compromising quality.
